pages.text: Creating jewels is a $(important)two-step process$():$(br2)$(bold)Step 1:$() Use the $(l:getting_started/crafting_jewels#jewel_creation_station)Jewel Creation Station$() to combine materials into a $(tool)Rough Jewel$().$(br2)$(bold)Step 2:$() Polish the rough jewel at the $(l:getting_started/polish_station)Polish Station$() to create a finished jewel!

pages.title: Jewel Creation Station
pages.text: Place your materials in the Jewel Creation Station to create rough jewels. Different materials grant different effects!

pages.title: Polish Station
pages.text: Use the Polish Station to polish your rough jewels into finished gems ready to attach to your gear!

pages.title: Material Examples
pages.text: $(li)$(5DADE2)Diamond$() → Mining Speed +2$(li)$(50C878)Emerald$() → Fortune +1$(li)$(E8E8E8)Quartz$() → Sharpness +2$(li)$(1E90FF)Lapis Lazuli$() → Looting +1$(li)$(FFD700)Gold Ingot$() → XP Boost +2$(br)Check the $(l:materials/all_materials)Materials Reference$() for a complete list!

pages.title: Multiple Effects
pages.text: Some powerful materials grant $(important)multiple effects$() at once!$(br2)For example, $(4A4A4A)Netherite Ingot$() provides:$(li)Durability +5$(li)Mining Speed +2$(li)Sharpness +2$(br2)This makes material choice strategic and rewarding!
